A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi confirms many Star Wars fans'(including me) worst fears when they heard that the new trilogy would have multiple directors. The entire movie is a mess. A wreck from start to finish. Any and all intrigue that was built up by Abrams is destroyed and thrown to the garbage can by Riann Johnson. The Last Jedi leaves the new trilogy feeling severely disconnected\, stale\, and uninteresting as we wait without too much suspense for what now seems to inevitably be a disappointing Episode 9.
